import Axios from "axios" import React, { useEffect } from "react" import { Col, ListGroup, Row, Image, Card, Button } from "react-bootstrap" import { useDispatch, useSelector } from "react-redux" import { Link } from "react-router-dom" import Loader from "../../components/loader/Loader" import Message from "../../components/message/Message" import { getOrderById } from "../../redux/order/orderAction" const OrderPage = ({ match }) => { const dispatch = useDispatch() const order = useSelector((state) => state.orderReducer) const { orderDetail, orderDetailFetchState, orderDetailErrorMassge } = order console.log(orderDetail?.orderItems) useEffect(() => { const addPaypalScript = async ()=>{ const {data} = await Axios.get("/api/config/paypal") const script = document.createElement("script" ) script.type = "text/javascript" script.s } dispatch(getOrderById({ id: match.params.id })) }, [match.params.id , dispatch ]) console.log(orderDetail, orderDetailFetchState, orderDetailErrorMassge) return orderDetailFetchState ? ( ) : orderDetailErrorMassge ? ( {orderDetailErrorMassge} ) : ( <>

Shipping

Name: {orderDetail?.orderCreator?.name}

Email: {" "} {" "} {orderDetail?.orderCreator.email}

{" "} Address: {orderDetail?.shippingAddress?.address} ,{" "} {orderDetail?.shippingAddress?.city} ,{" "} {orderDetail?.shippingAddress?.postalCode}, {orderDetail?.shippingAddress?.country}

{orderDetail?.isDeliverd ? ( paid on {orderDetail?.deliverdAt} ) : ( not deliverd )}

payment Method

method: {orderDetail?.paymentMethod}

{orderDetail?.isPaid ? ( paid on {orderDetail?.paidAt} ) : ( not paid )}

Order Items

{orderDetail?.orderItems?.length === 0 ? ( your cart is empty ) : ( {orderDetail?.orderItems?.map((item) => ( {item.name} {item.qty} x {item.price} = {item.qty * item.price}$ ))} )}

Order summary

 Items Price ${orderDetail?.itemsPrice} Shipping ${orderDetail?.shippingPrice} Tax ${orderDetail?.taxPrice} total ${orderDetail?.totalPrice} ) } export default OrderPage
